newsitem.title: USA: Parker Drilling to buy Bolivian contractor.
newsitem.headline: Parker Drilling to buy Bolivian contractor.

text.p: Parker Drilling Co said Tuesday it signed an agreement to acquire the assets of Bolifor S.A., a Bolivian-owned drilling contractor, for an undisclosed price.
Bolifor, which has rigs in Bolivia, Paraguay and Argentina, is selling 11 drilling rigs and an inventory of spare parts, tubulars, camps and vehicles, Parker said.
The buyer will also absorb all of Bolifor's current drilling contracts once the deal closes June 1.

Meanwhile, Parker said construction will begin soon on a 1,900-mile pipeline that will provide natural gas from Bolivia and other nearby nations to industries in Brazil. Completion of the $2-billion project is scheduled for late 1998 or early 1999, Parker said.
Parker shares closed up 3/8 Tuesday at 8-3/8.
